name: Knife Rush!
description:
"Knife Rush!" is a fun game of reflexes and skills in which you must show off your just in time knife throwing skills!

During each challenge you must throw all the knives into the logs to break them. Slash the apples and unlock new knives.

As you progress, the challenges become harder and you must time your throws to perfection!

Each 5th stage is defended by a boss - beat them to go to the next level.

This game has great playability and is a huge amount of fun. Test your reactions and timing today in "Knife Rush!"

Can you beat all the bosses? to become the knife master!
